DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether multiple nasal antigen challenge dust mite allergen produce increase nasal symptom local allergic inflammatory cell nose blood .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Multiple Nasal Exposures House Dust Mite Allergen Nasal Body Inflammation Airway Sensitivity
DOC.criteria: Healthy nonsmoking subject history allergic rhinitis consistent dust mite allergy show A positive skin prick test dust mite within 12 month study start Demonstrate symptomatic worsening grade nasal allergen challenge Subjects find sensitive house dust mite ( skin prick test produce wheal mean diameter great 11 mm ) . Presence respiratory disease history mild stable asthma require regular treatment . Any known contraindication methacholine challenge test Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
